name: ArenaGame
description:
You are an old fighter trying to survive the attack of multiple copies of you. Use your trusty gun and your misterious butter chicken meal to defeat them (WARNING! Side effects can happen when you consume it, use with caution).

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • J to shoot.
  • K to use your chicken.

This game was made for the Jame Gam Jam and its a prototype for another project.
